alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 8:19AM CDT until July 18 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BENTON AND MORGAN COUNTIES... At 819 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cole Camp, or 14 miles west of Versailles, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Versailles, Cole Camp, Stover, Barnett, Gravois Mills, Rocky Mount, Mora, Florence and Crockerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
